content.text: Welcome to the community of Nativity of Our Lord Parish in Etobicoke.
Nativity of Our Lord Parish has a new website!
This website is the early product of a collaboration between Nativity of Our Lord and ParishConnect.
ParishConnect is a new web-based service for Catholic Parishes designed and built at Nativity of Our Lord Parish.

Over the coming months you'll notice some new features and changes coming to this website as we work with the parish community to develop a web-experience that is truly meaningful and helps this community grow stronger in faith with one-another.
If you have any issues or questions please direct them to
We look forward to this journey together and ask for your prayers in this new digital ministry.
